00021     class DummyAnalyzer : public ldmx::Analyzer {
00022         public:
00023 
00024             DummyAnalyzer(const std::string& name, ldmx::Process& process) : ldmx::Analyzer(name, process) {}
00025 
00026             virtual void configure(const ldmx::ParameterSet& ps) {
00027                 caloCol_=ps.getString("caloHitCollection");
00028             }
00029 
00030             virtual void analyze(const ldmx::Event& event) {
00031                 std::cout << "DummyAnalyzer: Analyzing an event!" << std::endl;
00032                 const TClonesArray* tca=event.getCollection(caloCol_);
00033                 for (size_t i=0; i<tca->GetEntriesFast(); i++) {
00034                     const ldmx::CalorimeterHit* chit=(const ldmx::CalorimeterHit*)(tca->At(i));
00035                     h_energy->Fill(chit->getEnergy());
00036                 }
00037             }
00038             virtual void onFileOpen() {
00039                 std::cout << "DummyAnalyzer: Opening a file!" << std::endl;
00040             }
00041             virtual void onFileClose() {
00042                 std::cout << "DummyAnalyzer: Closing a file!" << std::endl;
00043             }
00044             virtual void onProcessStart() {
00045                 std::cout << "DummyAnalyzer: Starting processing!" << std::endl;
00046                 getHistoDirectory();
00047                 h_energy=new TH1F("Energy","Energy",500,0.0,1.0);
00048             }
00049             virtual void onProcessEnd() {
00050                 std::cout << "DummyAnalyzer: Finishing processing!" << std::endl;
00051             }
00052         private:
00053             TH1* h_energy;
00054             std::string caloCol_;
00055     };
